CustomField.description: Comma separated API names of the extra fields on the lookup object. Will appear after Name. (e.g. PDLM__Description__c, Users_Custom_Field__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Comma separated API names of the extra fields on the lookup object. Will appear after Name. (e.g. PDLM__Description__c, Users_Custom_Field__c)
CustomField.label: Extra Fields
